properties.name: org.displayName
properties.description: Name that is displayed in Stripe Checkout and Apple Pay. You may want to keep this brief as there is not a lot of room in these dialogs.  Defaults to blank.

properties.name: url.mainPage
properties.description: URL for main page of web site (text with `org.siteTitle` links to this). Default is `/`.

properties.name: email.signup.url
properties.description: Page where email signup resides.  Default is `/`.

properties.name: stripe.applyPayEnabled
properties.description: `true` to enable Apple Pay, `false` to disable.  Defaults to `true`.
